thread.section_title: Micazu Vacation Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Micazu Vacation Rentals | micazu.com
thread.title: Beatrice Maechler
thread.title_full: Micazu Vacation Rentals reviewed by Beatrice Maechler

author: Beatrice Maechler
title: Beatrice Maechler
text: I came across Micazu just by chance, when looking for a holiday home. The website is really very helpful and the given information are complete. Booking was very easy: Although on a Sunday, my booking request was answered within hours.
